nl.checkout.footer.merchantOfRecord: This order is processed by our online reseller & Merchant of Record, Polar, who also handles order-related inquiries and returns.
nl.checkout.form.billingAddress.label: Billing address
nl.checkout.pwywForm.label: Name a fair price
nl.checkout.pwywForm.amountFreeOrMinimum: Amount must be {zero} or at least {min}
nl.checkout.benefits.licenseKey.copiedToCli: License Key was copied to clipboard
nl.checkout.confirmation.failedTitle: A problem occurred while processing your order
nl.checkout.confirmation.processingDescript: Please wait while we confirm your payment.
nl.checkout.confirmation.successDescription: You're now eligible for the benefits of {product}.
nl.checkout.confirmation.failedDescription: Please try again or contact support.
nl.checkout.loading.paymentSuccessful: Payment successful! Getting your products ready...
nl.checkout.loading.confirmationTokenFailed: Failed to create confirmation token, please try again later.
nl.checkout.footer.mandateSubscriptionTrial: By clicking "Start trial," you authorize Polar Software, Inc., our online reseller and merchant of record, to charge your selected payment method in the amount shown above at the end of your trial period and on each subsequent billing date until you cancel. You may cancel at any time before the end of your trial to avoid being charged.
nl.checkout.footer.mandateSubscription: By clicking "Subscribe now," you authorize Polar Software, Inc., our online reseller and merchant of record, to immediately charge your selected payment method in the amount shown above and to charge the same amount on each subsequent billing date until you cancel.
nl.checkout.footer.mandateOneTime: By clicking "Pay now," you authorize Polar Software, Inc., our online reseller and merchant of record, to charge your selected payment method the amount shown above. This is a one-time charge.
